entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -44.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -44.3°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -48.5°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 40.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 40. Wind chill minus 63 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 57. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
